p.8: The Unity Games Developer is a member of the WM team responsible for developing games, mostly for third-party entertainment clients. Game Devs at WM will work under Sr. Technical Director and Project Managers on specified game features, or sometimes completely independently on smaller projects. Developers may be responsible for creating a wide range of potential game features, from implementing key mechanics and engine tech, to integrating sounds and animations.
p.10: There=E2=80=99s often room for creative agency in game feature design, balancing, and polish as well. Everyone at WM is encouraged to get involved in game design meetings, brainstorms, and concept development.
